name: Futa University
description:
Futa University is a game about higher education in the way of futanari. You play as a futa student attending a university full of horny futa girls. Each girl has her own unique personality, sexual preferences, and course of study. As you progress through the game, you'll be able to interact with the girls in many ways.
The gameplay consists of solving a series of match 3 puzzles with a visual novel dialogue in-between. You also get to make choices that affect the gameplay.
Every match you make rewards you with a small response from your examine in the form of a juicy render, and many explicit sex scenes after the puzzle is finished!
Study exams include:
- Mastering solo play, both hand and mouth options included.
- Edging techniques to deliver maximum force and volume cumshots.
- Taking part in a steamy threesome with two classmates.
- Learning oral techniques from the experienced teachers.
- Penetrating the tight ass of your shy classmates.
- Having a naughty classroom discussion with your sexy professor.
Puzzles in Futa University are challenging, but with the right strategy you will beat them! The perfect level of difficulty for most players.
Features:
- Visual novel elements before and after each game.
- Polished Match 3 gameplay with a custom implementation with attention to detail.
- High quality CG render unlocked after every game.
- Failure to progress is also progress.
- Choices during dialogue affect gameplay.
- Explicit sex scenes!
Rules of the match 3:
- You must match 3 or more of the same gems in a row or column.
- Each gem type has a different meaning and effect.
- You must keep an eye on your exam points as well as remaining turns counter.
- You must "defeat" the opponent - your examiner - by matching heart symbols and seducing her.
- You can also use skills to alter the game. But be careful, they only have limited amount of uses!
